allowDisassembly.description: Whether or not disassembly is permitted

antiVelocityMassRelevance.description: How much inertia affects Eureka ships. Max 10 = full inertia

ballastNoWeight.description: Weight of ballast when highest redstone power

ballastWeight.description: Weight of ballast when lowest redstone power

baseSpeed.description: The speed a ship with no engines can move at

blockBlacklist.description: Blacklist of blocks that don't get assembled

items.description: Blacklist of blocks that don't get assembled

diagonals.description: Whether the ship helm assembles diagonally connected blocks or not

doFluidDrag.description: Allow Eureka controlled ships to be affected by fluid drag

engineHeatGain.description: The amount of heat a gain per tick (when burning)

engineHeatLoss.description: The amount of heat a engine loses per tick

enginePower.description: Movement power per engine heated fully

floaterBuoyantFactorPerKg.description: The amount extra that each floater will make the ship float, per kg mass

linearStabilizeMaxAntiVelocity.description: How fast a ship will stop. 1 = fast stop, 0 = slow stop

massPerBalloon.description: Amount of mass in kg a balloon can lift

maxCasualSpeed.description: Max speed of a ship without boosting

maxFloaterBuoyantFactor.description: The maximum amount extra each floater will multiply the buoyant force by, irrespective of mass

maxSizeForTurnSpeedPenalty.description: The maximum distance from center of mass to one end of the ship considered by the turn speed. At it's default of 16, it ensures that really large ships will turn at the same speed as a ship with a center of mass only 16 blocks away from the farthest point in the ship. That way, large ships do not turn painfully slowly

minEnginePower.description: Movement power per engine with minimal heat

popSideBalloonChance.description: Chance for popped balloons to pop adjacent balloons, per side

stabilizationSpeed.description: The speed at which the ship stabilizes

stabilizationTorqueConstant.description: How much torque a ship will apply to try and keep level

turnAcceleration.description: The maximum linear acceleration at any point on the ship caused by helm torque

turnSpeed.description: The maximum linear velocity at any point on the ship caused by helm torque
